name.japanese: 海軍本部（マリンフォード）

description: The headquarters of the Marines, located at Marineford. In this episode, it is split in two by Whitebeard's earthquake attack.

keyEvents.title: Whitebeard Destroys Marine Headquarters
keyEvents.description: Whitebeard unleashes a massive earthquake attack that splits the entire Marine Headquarters plaza in two, creating a giant fissure.
keyEvents.significance: The physical destruction of Marine Headquarters symbolizes the crumbling of the Marines' authority and the chaos Whitebeard warned would follow his death.

statusHistory.reason: Split in two by Whitebeard's earthquake attack
